title: Everything you need for Swiss invoicing
subtitle: Built specifically for the Swiss market with compliance and efficiency in mind

swissQrBill.title: Swiss QR-Bill Compliance
swissQrBill.description: Generate compliant Swiss QR-bills automatically with all required fields and formatting.

multiCurrency.title: Multi-Currency Support
multiCurrency.description: Handle CHF and EUR invoices seamlessly with automatic currency conversion and formatting.

automation.title: Smart Automation
automation.description: Automate invoice creation, sending, and follow-ups to save time and reduce errors.

integration.title: Easy Integrations
integration.description: Connect with your existing tools and workflows through our comprehensive API.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Bank-level security with Swiss data residency and GDPR compliance.

support.title: Swiss Support
support.description: Get help from our local Swiss team who understand your business needs.
